name: uniplan-test-teams
description: Hệ thống test tự động cho chức năng Teams của UniPlan

scripts.menu1: node -e "const MainSystem = require('./src/mainTestSystem'); const system = new MainSystem(); system.executeMenu1();"
scripts.menu2: node -e "const MainSystem = require('./src/mainTestSystem'); const system = new MainSystem(); system.executeMenu2();"
scripts.menu3: node -e "const MainSystem = require('./src/mainTestSystem'); const system = new MainSystem(); system.executeMenu3();"
scripts.menu4: node -e "const MainSystem = require('./src/mainTestSystem'); const system = new MainSystem(); system.executeMenu4();"
scripts.menu5: node -e "const MainSystem = require('./src/mainTestSystem'); const system = new MainSystem(); system.executeMenu5();"
scripts.menu6: node -e "const MainSystem = require('./src/mainTestSystem'); const system = new MainSystem(); system.executeMenu6();"
scripts.auto-run: node -e "const MainSystem = require('./src/mainTestSystem'); const system = new MainSystem(); system.executeAutoRun();"
scripts.stats: node -e "const MainSystem = require('./src/mainTestSystem'); const system = new MainSystem(); system.viewStatistics();"

author: UniPlan Development Team
